languages.text: "Да, эттфатер. Оставь кого-то из своих ослабевших слуг здесь. Если будет нужда, я могу биться и за двоих, и за пятерых".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Я не из тех, кто пропускает славную сечу, эттфатер — а в тылу подвига не сыщешь".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever of your servants are sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."
languages.original_text: "Да, эттфатер. Оставь кого-то из своих ослабевших слуг здесь. Если будет нужда, я могу биться и за двоих, и за пятерых".

traits.locale_text: "The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever one of your servants is sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."
"The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever one of your servants is sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."
"The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever of your servants are sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."

"The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever of your servants are sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."

languages.text: "Der Rat des Gesetzeshüters ist gut, Aett-Vater. Lasst alle Diener hier, denen ihre Stärke genommen wurde. Wenn es sein muss, kann ich für zwei oder fünf kämpfen."
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever of your servants are sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."

traits.locale_text: "Der Rat des Gesetzeshüters ist gut, Aett-Vater. Lasst alle Diener hier, denen ihre Stärke genommen wurde. Wenn es sein muss, kann ich für zwei oder fünf kämpfen."

languages.text: « Le gardien de la loi est de bon conseil, Aett-Vater. Abandonnez ici tous vos serviteurs affaiblis. Si le besoin s'en fait sentir, je pourrai me battre comme deux, ou même cinq hommes. »
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever of your servants are sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."

traits.locale_text: « Le gardien de la loi est de bon conseil, Aett-Vater. Abandonnez ici tous vos serviteurs affaiblis. Si le besoin s'en fait sentir, je pourrai me battre comme deux, ou même cinq hommes. »

languages.text: “那个执法者的建议很有道理，狼领。那些身体孱弱的仆人就留在这里吧。如果你需要帮忙战斗，我一个人就能顶两个，或者五个。”
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever of your servants are sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."

traits.locale_text: “那个执法者的建议很有道理，狼领。那些身体孱弱的仆人就留在这里吧。如果你需要帮忙战斗，我一个人就能顶两个，或者五个。”

languages.text: «El consejo del legislador es sensato, Aett-Vater. Deje aquí a los sirvientes que hayan perdido las fuerzas. De ser necesario, puedo suplir a dos guerreros, o a cinco».
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever of your servants are sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."

traits.locale_text: «El consejo del legislador es sensato, Aett-Vater. Deje aquí a los sirvientes que hayan perdido las fuerzas. De ser necesario, puedo suplir a dos guerreros, o a cinco».

languages.text: 「アエット＝ヴァテル、その法の番人の助言はもっともだ。従僕の中に力尽きた者がいるなら、ここに残していけ。必要とあらば、俺は戦士2人分…いや5人分の重荷すら引き受けられるぞ」
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever of your servants are sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."

traits.locale_text: 「アエット＝ヴァテル、その法の番人の助言はもっともだ。従僕の中に力尽きた者がいるなら、ここに残していけ。必要とあらば、俺は戦士2人分…いや5人分の重荷すら引き受けられるぞ」

languages.text: "Kanun koruyucunun tavsiyesi sağlam Aett-Vater. Hizmetkârlarından gücü tükenenleri burada bırak. Gerekirse iki, hatta beş savaşçının yükünü çekebilirim."
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper's advice is sound, Aett-Vater. Whichever of your servants are sapped of their strength, leave them here. If there is need, I can pull the weight of two fighters, or five."

traits.locale_text: "Kanun koruyucunun tavsiyesi sağlam Aett-Vater. Hizmetkârlarınızdan gücü tükenenleri burada bırakın. Gerekirse iki hatta beş savaşçının yükünü çekebilirim."
